DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to investigate the expression of different inflammatory proteins in cancer and normal pancreatic tissue.
DOC.brief_title: Expression of Inflammatory Proteins in Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose: to investigate the expression of different inflammatory proteins in cancer and normal pancreatic tissue - Trial with surgical intervention
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients with pancreatic cancer or chronic pancreatitis Exclusion criteria: Patients with alpha 1antitrypsin deficiency
